FREN 101.courseDesc: Introductory French. Includes listening, speaking, reading, and writing.

FREN 201.courseDesc: Intermediate French. Includes grammar review, listening, speaking, and reading, with individual audiolingual practice.

FREN 310.courseDesc: French 310 provides advanced practice in written and oral communication, including journalistic, professional, and creative writing. Examines contemporary cultural contexts through media and news. Taught in French.

FREN 320.fullName: Introduction to Language for the Professions
FREN 320.courseDesc: This course provides an introduction to communication skills in areas such as contemporary business, health, and law in a culturally sensitive fashion. The content of this course may change every term it is offered and is repeatable for credit. Taught in French.
FREN 320.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 36 credits

FREN 330.courseDesc: This course provides an introduction to the analysis of individual and collective identities, including issues of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, class, nationality, and religion. The content of this course may change every term it is offered and is repeatable for credit. Taught in French.
FREN 330.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 36 credits

FREN 340.courseDesc: This course provides an introduction to the analysis of power relations and issues of (in)equality rooted in contemporary political and socio-economic systems. The content of this course may change every term it is offered and is repeatable for credit. Taught in French.
FREN 340.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 36 credits

FREN 350.fullName: Introduction to Language, Media, and Society
FREN 350.courseDesc: This course provides an introduction to the role of language and media in society, including sociolinguistics, gender, media studies, and communication. The content of this course may change every term it is offered and is repeatable for credit. Taught in French.
FREN 350.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 36 credits

FREN 410.courseDesc: This course provides advanced grammar instruction and fosters translation and communication skills within a contemporary cultural context. The content of this course may change every term it is offered and is repeatable for credit. Taught in French.
FREN 410.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 36 credits

FREN 420.fullName: Advanced Studies in Language for the Professions

FREN 420.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 36 credits

The content ofFREN 430may change every term it is offered and is repeatable for credit. Taught in French.
FREN 430.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 36 credits

FREN 440.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 36 credits
